title: Server down?
body:
I didn't see anything anywhere but I haven't been able to login for a little while now... :/

http://i.imgur.com/7QDELZ6.jpg

replies.body: Thanks for the screenshot!  It looks like your connection is failing to reach our login servers, so it can't authenticate and get in.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and get things fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Well whatever it was seemed to fix itself finally.
